name: Orb Effect
description:
Orb Effect is an action fantasy game where you combine different orb colors to cast powerful spells and destroy your enemies. Survive through each day and uncover the secret of your power!

Features:

  • An innovative magic system allowing you to combine different orb colors to cast different spells
  • Fun and challenging combat: Battle different enemies each with different skills and tactics, forcing you to derive your own strategy to stand a chance against them. Choose the right skill at the right moment. Become adept at certain skills while still able to adapt quickly to the situation.
  • Extensive upgrades: Level up your Obs to enhance your spells. Gain enough Mutation points to further transform your spells, aiding you in your battle.
